{"lineNumber":21608,"originalJapaneseLine":"（サテラ様……最近作ルがーでぃあん、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Lady Satera... lately the guardians you've been making,"},

{"lineNumber":21609,"originalJapaneseLine":"　口、大キイノガ多イ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"seem to have a lot of issues with their mouths...)"},

{"lineNumber":21612,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに、小さく、ノックの音がした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, there was a soft knock."},

{"lineNumber":21613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ様。お茶をお持ちしました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Satera. I've brought you some tea.\""},{"lineNumber":21614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……ああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... ah.\""},{"lineNumber":21615,"originalJapaneseLine":"温かい紅茶の香気が、ふんわりと部屋に漂う。","translatedEnglishLine":"The warm aroma of tea gently filled the room."},

{"lineNumber":21616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あいつはまだ帰ってこないのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That guy still hasn't come back?\""},

{"lineNumber":21617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「御主人様でございますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it about the master?"},

{"lineNumber":21618,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろお帰りになる頃の予定ですが」","translatedEnglishLine":"He should be returning around this time.\""},{"lineNumber":21619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん。どこをほっつき歩いてるんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. Where on earth has he been wandering...\""},{"lineNumber":21620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何か御用がございましたでしょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is there something you need?\""},{"lineNumber":21621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「べ、別に……何もない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no... nothing."},{"lineNumber":21622,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ、文句を言ってやろうと思ってるだけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I just want to complain a little."},{"lineNumber":21623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　主であるサテラに、留守番なんて押しつけて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"To push the duty of house-sitting onto Lady Satera, his master!\""},

{"lineNumber":21624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このような時勢でございます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In times like these,"},

{"lineNumber":21625,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私どものような、留守を預かる者にとっては、","translatedEnglishLine":"for people like us who watch over the house,"},

{"lineNumber":21626,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大変助かっております」","translatedEnglishLine":"it is a great help.\""},{"lineNumber":21627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん……お茶、おかわりだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph... More tea, please.\""},{"lineNumber":21628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かしこまりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Certainly.\""},{"lineNumber":21629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……――――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...――――!\""},{"lineNumber":21630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":21631,"originalJapaneseLine":"丁重な仕草でポットから紅茶が注がれようとして……","translatedEnglishLine":"With a courteous gesture, tea was about to be poured from the pot..."},{"lineNumber":21632,"originalJapaneseLine":"その手が止まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"But the hand stopped."},{"lineNumber":21633,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………誰か来たか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Did someone come?\""},{"lineNumber":21634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。異常です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. Something's wrong."},{"lineNumber":21635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この城には、パステル様とマジック様が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel-sama and Magic-sama had,"},{"lineNumber":21636,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時間を掛けて二重に結界を張っておられたはず」","translatedEnglishLine":"carefully established a double barrier around this castle.\""},{"lineNumber":21637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……行くぞ、シーザー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Let's go, Caesar.\""},{"lineNumber":21638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハイ、サテラ様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, Lady Satera!\""},{"lineNumber":21639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……城主は……ランスは留守、か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...The lord... Rance is not home, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":21640,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すぐに帰ってくるかも知れませんけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Though he might come back soon.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果的に同じような所に倒れ込んだ主従に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, the master and servant collapsed in almost the same place,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者の刃が落ちる。
「…………終わりか」
「はーい。お疲れ様でした。
まあ、派手にやったしすぐに邪魔が来そうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, we made a big scene, so trouble might come quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひょいと、コーラが魔血魂を回収する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quickly, Kora retrieved the demon blood soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁ……用は済んだ。行くぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... the job is done. Let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （まずかったかな、殺しちゃ……ま、いっか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Was that a mistake, killing them... ah well.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （片割れ生かしてて後で万が一アレに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If I had left one alive and something happened to me afterward...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってなったら、それこそ大目玉だろうしなぁ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That would definitely cause a huge scolding.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の魔人が、勇者の手によって殺された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon of Rance Castle was killed by the hero's hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん…………ダメだ。バランスが悪い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... no good. The balance is off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜がしゃーん＞
作りかけていたガーディアンを、
サテラはぽいっと捨てた。
「今日は集中できないな……」
（サテラ様……最近作ルがーでぃあん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Lady Satera... lately the guardians you've been making,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 口、大キイノガ多イ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seem to have a lot of issues with their mouths...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな事を思いながら、シーザーは
さかさかと箒とチリトリで残骸を回収する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: quickly gathered the debris with a broom and dustpan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに、小さく、ノックの音がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, there was a soft knock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様。お茶をお持ちしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Satera. I've brought you some tea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……ああ」
温かい紅茶の香気が、ふんわりと部屋に漂う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The warm aroma of tea gently filled the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あいつはまだ帰ってこないのか」
「御主人様でございますか？
そろそろお帰りになる頃の予定ですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He should be returning around this time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。どこをほっつき歩いてるんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. Where on earth has he been wandering..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何か御用がございましたでしょうか」
「べ、別に……何もない。
ただ、文句を言ってやろうと思ってるだけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just want to complain a little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主であるサテラに、留守番なんて押しつけて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To push the duty of house-sitting onto Lady Satera, his master!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このような時勢でございます。
私どものような、留守を預かる者にとっては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for people like us who watch over the house,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変助かっております」
「ふん……お茶、おかわりだ」
「かしこまりました」
丁重な仕草でポットから紅茶が注がれようとして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a courteous gesture, tea was about to be poured from the pot...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その手が止まった。
「はい。異常です。
この城には、パステル様とマジック様が、
時間を掛けて二重に結界を張っておられたはず」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: carefully established a double barrier around this castle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……行くぞ、シーザー」
「ハイ、サテラ様！」
「……城主は……ランスは留守、か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The lord... Rance is not home, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すぐに帰ってくるかも知れませんけどね」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
